Studies.title: Web Integrator Diploma

Studies.text: Acquired skills through 12 web development projects validated by professionals. Training focused on learning CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and React & Redux.

Experiences.title: Head of Design
Experiences.subtitle: CreatLinx, London
Experiences.text: Co-founder of a blockchain/cryptocurrency startup. Responsible for recruitment, design validation, development, and strategic planning. Soft skills: versatility, adaptability, creativity.

Experiences.title: Various Roles in the Restaurant Industry
Experiences.subtitle: Huttopia, Columbus, F&Co., Strasbourg
Experiences.text: Cook and waiter in a restaurant for 2 years. Animator and bartender at a camping site during the seasonal period.

Experiences.title: Versatile Employee
Experiences.subtitle: Auchan, Illkirch
Experiences.text: Versatile employee in a supermarket within the maintenance team. Responsible for restocking and maintaining shelves, customer service and advice, inventory handling, and training on specialized machinery.

Hobbies.title: Music
Hobbies.text: Guitar, Piano, Pad, Digital Audio Workstation (advanced knowledge of FL Studio and numerous audio plugins).

Profil.title: Profile
Profil.text: Passionate about web development, I have gained experience in the restaurant and customer service sectors. Self-taught and a fast learner, I am seeking a position that allows me to develop my personal projects while meeting my needs.
